titleInfo.title: 'File No. E/16 V. O. Correspondence Regarding Mortgages.'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the front to the rear of the file. Folios 32-33 are file notes.

Foliation: the main foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 34; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio. An additional foliation sequence is present in parallel between ff 4-33; these numbers are also written in pencil, but are not circled.

mods.abstract: The file contains correspondence regarding mortgages in Bahrain, including a request from the Eastern Bank for information about the legal value of a deposit of title deeds. In turn, the Political Agency explains that the deposit of title deeds of immoveable property accompanied by a mortgage deed constitutes a valid mortgage in Bahrain and that the registration of the mortgage is not compulsory.The main correspondence is between the Political Agency, Bahrain, and the Eastern Bank Limited.
